text: Marc Roca Junqué (born 26 November 1996) is a Spanish professional footballer who plays defensive midfielder for La Liga club Real Betis, on loan from Leeds United. ==Career statistics== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League League League National cup National cup League cup League cup Europe Europe Other Other Total Total Club Season Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Espanyol B 2014–15 Segunda División B 11 1 — — — — — — — — 11 1 Espanyol B 2015–16 Segunda División B 34 3 — — — — — — — — 34 3 Espanyol B 2016–17 Segunda División B 6 2 — — — — — — — — 6 2 Espanyol B Total Total 51 6 — — — — — — — — 51 6 Espanyol 2016–17 La Liga 25 0 1 0 — — — — — — 26 0 Espanyol 2017–18 La Liga 8 0 1 0 — — — — — — 9 0 Espanyol 2018–19 La Liga 35 1 5 0 — — — — — — 40 1 Espanyol 2019–20 La Liga 35 2 1 0 — — 8 0 — — 44 2 Espanyol 2020–21 Segunda División 2 0 0 0 — — — — — — 2 0 Espanyol Total Total 105 3 8 0 — — 8 0 — — 121 3 Bayern Munich 2020–21 Bundesliga 6 0 2 0 — — 2 0 1 0 11 0 Bayern Munich 2021–22 Bundesliga 9 0 0 0 — — 4 0 0 0 13 0 Bayern Munich Total Total 15 0 2 0 — — 6 0 1 0 24 0 Leeds United 2022–23 Premier League 32 1 3 0 1 0 — — — — 36 1 Betis (loan) 2023–24 La Liga 24 2 3 1 — — 8 1 — 35 4 Career total Career total Career total 227 12 16 1 1 0 22 1 1 0 267 14 ==Honours== Espanyol *Segunda División: 2020–21 Bayern Munich *Bundesliga: 2020–21, 2021–22 *FIFA Club World Cup: 2020 Spain U21 *UEFA European Under-21 Championship: 2019 == References == Category:1996 births Category:Footballers from Catalonia Category:Living people Category:FC Bayern München players Category:Leeds United F.C. players
